content: That's really helpful, thanks for explaining the factors that can affect the 70-80% rule. Speaking of retirement, my classmate who's 62 and already retired has been giving me some great advice on managing my time and prioritizing my goals. As a retired teacher, she's got a wealth of experience and insight to share. Do you think it's a good idea to seek out mentors or advisors in various stages of their careers or lives to get different perspectives and learn from their experiences?
